mapper.sql: QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_CLASS, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY, POINT_NUMBER, POINT, SOURCE, USETIMES, TYPE, QUESTION_SCORE, QUESTION_TIME, TEACHING_MATERIAL, GRADE, CHAPTER, SINGGLE, ANSWER, ANALYSIS, QUESTION_HOT, OWNNER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, QUESTION_COMMENT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from question
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into question (QUESTION_ID, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_CLASS, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY, POINT_NUMBER, POINT, SOURCE, USETIMES, TYPE, QUESTION_SCORE, QUESTION_TIME, TEACHING_MATERIAL, GRADE, CHAPTER, SINGGLE, ANSWER, ANALYSIS, QUESTION_HOT, OWNNER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, QUESTION_COMMENT) values (#{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{questionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teachingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singgle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionHot,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{questionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update question
QUESTION_ID = #{record.questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{record.questionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_CLASS = #{record.questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_DIFFICULTY = #{record.questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINT_NUMBER = #{record.pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINT = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USETIMES = #{record.usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_SCORE = #{record.questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUESTION_TIME = #{record.questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEACHING_MATERIAL = #{record.teachingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE = #{record.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHAPTER = #{record.chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SINGGLE = #{record.singgle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER = #{record.answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUESTION_COMMENT = #{record.questionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update question set QUESTION_ID = #{record.questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QUESTION_TYPE = #{record.questionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_CLASS = #{record.questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY = #{record.questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POINT_NUMBER = #{record.pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POINT = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{record.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USETIMES = #{record.usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_SCORE = #{record.questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUESTION_TIME = #{record.questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEACHING_MATERIAL = #{record.teachingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{record.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHAPTER = #{record.chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SINGGLE = #{record.singgle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{record.answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANALYSIS = #{record.analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_HOT = #{record.questionHot,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNNER = #{record.ownner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUESTION_COMMENT = #{record.questionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update question
QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_CLASS = #{questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_DIFFICULTY = #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINT_NUMBER = #{pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINT = #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USETIMES = #{usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
QUESTION_SCORE = #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUESTION_TIME = #{questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEACHING_MATERIAL = #{teachingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHAPTER = #{chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SINGGLE = #{singgle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANALYSIS = #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_HOT = #{questionHot,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNNER = #{ownner,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUESTION_COMMENT = #{questionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update question set QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_CLASS = #{questionClass,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_DIFFICULTY = #{questionDifficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POINT_NUMBER = #{pointNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POINT = #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USETIMES = #{usetimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUESTION_SCORE = #{questionScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUESTION_TIME = #{questionTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEACHING_MATERIAL = #{teachingMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHAPTER = #{chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SINGGLE = #{singgle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANALYSIS = #{analysis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_HOT = #{questionHot,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNNER = #{ownner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUESTION_COMMENT = #{questionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
